description: Creates an Amazon DataZone business glossary.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this business glossary is created.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of this business glossary.

parameters.name: owningProjectIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project that currently owns business glossary.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of this business glossary.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this business glossary is created.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of this business glossary.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of this business glossary.

nested_items.name: owningProjectId
nested_items.description: The ID of the project that currently owns this business glossary.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of this business glossary.
